scripts.launch: concurrently "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev -- --port 5555"
scripts.clean-all: npm cache clean --force && npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json backend/node_modules backend/package-lock.json frontend/node_modules frontend/package-lock.json
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.fix: npm cache clean --force && npm install -g npm@latest
